display.title: Omni Tool
description: Universal tool that combines Pickaxe, Axe, Shovel, Shear and even Swords in one simple rod.
Its mining level on par with diamond made tools. One mined block will cost 100 Energy and it will use 125 Energy on entity hit.

subtitle.text: Universal tool that combines Pickaxe, Axe, Shovel, Shear and even Swords in one simple rod.
